isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 27-SI SERIES, TYPE 200 - REPAIR PROCEDURES - MAGNETIZING THE ROTOR

svcproc.title: MAGNETIZING THE ROTOR
svcproc.para: The rotor normally retains magnetism to provide voltage build-up when the engine is started. After disassembly or servicing however, it may be necessary to re-establish the magnetism. To magnetize the rotor, connect the alternator to the battery in a normal manner; then momentarily connect a jumper lead from the battery positive post to the alternator relay terminal. This procedure will restore the normal residual magnetism in the rotor.
